column4: My ISP told me to set the computer with the netmask 255.255.255.0 and gateway to 192.168.80.1 to get ssh working, as they had opened another DMZ zone that were opened for ssh. Anyone knows?

My ISP told me to set the computer with the netmask 255.255.255.0 and gateway to 192.168.80.1 to get ssh working, as they had opened another DMZ zone that were opened for ssh. Anyone knows how to make these changes to my computer?
System -> Administration -> Networking, select your network card, and edit the settings
